TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
You ask Nertea.

I wish to "like" the previous post, just because.

Granted, however you already have.

I wish for some goldfish crackers.

Granted, Here, Golden Fish Crackers.

I wish that these mosquitoes would be VANISHEDfrom this planet.

Edited March 22, 2022 by Venusian Explorer

Granted. Frogs died from starvation. People call you Vanishian Explorer.

I wish there was an abiogenic blood lake to let both mosquitoes, frogs, and humans coexist peacefully.

P.S.
Mosquitoes? Now?! The snow is ankle-deep on the street.

Granted, but everyone dies as since the mosquitoes frogs and humans coexist they have nothing to eat.

I wish that nothing bad ever happens to me.

Granted, you are stuck in a zero-g space room where nothing happens at all.

I wish for Nertea to do good working for ksp2.

granted, he does such good work that the entire rest of the team quits and the game never releases.

I wish to do well on my next exam.

Granted, you do so well that the teacher thinks you cheated and gives you an automatic F.

I wish for BIG SRBs in KSP2

Granted: Silly Rabbit Bunnies swarm KSP2.

I wish for Small Rabbit Bunnies.

Granted, here's a big hare bug!

I wish for a mountain on my window

Granted. You live in a dungeon.

1 hour ago, ColdJ said:

I wish for Small Rabbit Bunnies.

Granted. You get Small Rabid Bunnies.

***

I wish to continue the previous doing.

Granted: The earth is now covered in mosquitoes.

I wish a tunnel in the sky.

Granted. But it's someone's garbage disposal.

I wish for underground satellites.

Granted: A cave full of Balsa wood chairs.

I wish for a big book of answers.

Granted.  The book is huge.  Unfortunately all the answers are wrong answers.

I wish having yet another cup of coffee was always a good decision

Granted. Every time when you are going to drink some coffee, you realize that you need another cup of coffee, rather than the one which you are holding.

I wish to continue watching the movie, suddenly interrupted by the messenger conversation.

Granted, as you continue watching the movie, you start to be confused on what's happening. You rage a few minutes later and break the screen of whatever device you're using.

I wish to remember it all too well

Granted. You imagine a memory well. You can recall everything by diving inside.

I wish Loki was using the method of Loki

Edited March 24, 2022 by kerbiloid

Granted: He is using the method of loci.

I wish a wish that if corrupted will make people feel good.

Granted. They feel good and keep stupidly smiling forever.

I wish for an earthoscope to watch the core.

Granted.
<snip>

Who did it?

Some content has been removed.

Please strive to keep the content family friendly.


Thank you for your understanding.

Granted: The Doctor did.

I wish for a magic blue box.

Granted. Now you have to explain the police the origin of the blue box full of magic.

I wish for mana.

In our country, mana means to inherit. So someone inherits you a pink bike. With unicorns, of course!

I wish to someday be successful and work as an astronomer
